titleStmt.title: The independent's loyalty. Or, The most barbarous plot (to murther his sacred Majestie) very fully discovered. With a cleere and perfect answer, to the Lord Wharton's evasions.
titleStmt.author: Osborne, Richard, fl. 1648.

notesStmt.note: Includes letters from Richard Osborne, to whom the whole is sometimes attributed.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
